title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.9 - Supervision and monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.9 - Supervision and monitoring

State Regulations

Each day placement program shall require: (a) an appropriate level of
supervision; (b) a review of the
progress of each youth in the day placement program with the youth and, to the
extent feasible, the parent at least once every 30 days; and
(c) a review of the conditions of
participation at least once every 30 days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
178.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
